main event: On the evening of July 12, 1964, several residents of Frankfort, Indiana, reported seeing a bright white light that was stationary for a few seconds, then accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting involved a luminous, disc-shaped object that hovered and maneuvered for about 20 minutes in the sky., One witness, a well-respected businessman, claimed to see 'portholes' on the object's surface through binoculars., There was considerable excitement in the community with many residents hoping to see the object., The report indicated that the object made no sound during the observation., The light was described as bluish-white and was observed for 3-5 minutes before it moved rapidly away.
